name: Anand.C
summary: Seeking a challenging and exciting job in a growth oriented industry where my potential for hard work and skills will be fully utilized.

experience.title: Services Engineer
experience.company: Electrical items, for Legrand, Havells, Indo Asian
experience.description: Performed service and maintenance of electrical items for Legrand, Havells and Indo Asian.

experience.title: Head General Goods
experience.description: Head of General Goods Division responsible for importation, sales, distribution, servicing & repairs of motorcycles, air conditioners, and televisions. Oversaw bike preparation, job cards, workshop supervision, repairs, spare parts, wiring, lathe work, vulcanizing, and certification of workshop work; estimated repair costs and spares; planned annual spare parts requirements; conducted regular free services as per TVS Motors Co. norms.

experience.title: Service Centre Manager
experience.description: In charge of the workshop; regular check-ups of brand new bikes before delivery; handle customer repairs; oversee repairs, spare parts, testing and certification of work; cost estimation for repairs and spares; plan annual spare parts requirements and free services as per TVS Motors Co. norms.

experience.title: Service Centre Manager
experience.description: Authorized TVS motorbikes dealer; managed the service centre; supervised workshop operations including repairs, spares, lathe, vulcanizing, electrical and wiring work; prepared job-cards, certified work, estimated costs for repairs and spare parts; organized annual spare part requirements and free services per company norms.

experience.title: Service Engineer
experience.description: Service Engineer in the TVS motorbikes service department; handled after-sales services, sales and spare parts; ensured customer satisfaction.

experience.title: Customer Relations Officer
experience.description: Looked after sales & services of TVS motorcycles; managed customer communications and complaints; in charge of client bikes before and after sales.
